title: Gosho Aoyama's Collection of Short Stories
synopsis: GOSHO collection reveals the origin of the smash hit "Detective Conan." "GO" into his world, and we will "SHO" you SEVEN romantic and exciting stories created by GOSHO AOYAMA.
characters: ['Edogawa, Conan', 'Kudou, Yuusaku', 'Kudou, Yukiko', 'Mouri, Ran', 'Yoshida, Ayumi', 'Suzuki, Sonoko', 'Tsuburaya, Mitsuhiko', 'Kojima, Genta']
